title: Display not showing or extending in Teams meeting
problem_statement: User is in a meeting or conference and the external screen, projector, or extended display is not showing correctly during a Microsoft Teams meeting.
description: 1) Press Windows + P. 2) Select "Duplicate" for the same screen or "Extend" for extended display. 3) Unplug and re-plug the HDMI or USB-C cable once. 4) Go to Settings → System → Display → Click "Detect". 5) Confirm the screen is visible in Teams.

action.next_step: Check if the external screen or projector is now visible and correctly displaying in the Teams meeting.

title: Audio not working in Teams meeting
problem_statement: User is unable to hear sound or audio is coming from the wrong device during a Microsoft Teams meeting.
description: 1) Click the speaker icon in the taskbar. 2) Open Sound settings. 3) Set Output device to "Jabra" or "Polycom". 4) Open Microsoft Teams → Settings → Devices. 5) Select the same speaker and microphone.

action.next_step: Play a test sound or ask someone in the meeting to confirm audio is working.
